extendedInfo.description: Themed Digital Clock widget.Also check out my new game, Word ShuffleDon't like 3.0? Email me with details why and i can provide a 2.6 build. Thanks!Need help installing? Run DigiClock settings from your app drawer and check out help!Other Problems? Help on dev site! Didn't help? EMAIL ME, i'll fix it!IF STOPS UPDATING, CHECK IF A TASK MANAGER IS KILLING IT!Cyanogen Mod may kill it aggressively. But shouldn't anymore ;)USE: LONG PRESS HOMESCREEN, SELECT WIDGETPlease support dev by buying the Donate version!

reviews.title: Great, customizable clock
reviews.comment: Great clock app. Does what you\'d want it too, and I really appreciate the degree of customization it offers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Simple to use. Very accurate with no issues. Light on battery use, highly recommended. EVO4G
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally a great clock
reviews.comment: Tried quite a few apps before finding this one. All I wanted was for it to keep time, be big enough to see, date centered with time, and have a good font with a clear background.  Beautiful job! I can\'t believe how hard it was to find one that does the basics well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great! Love it! fun and colorful. GREAT WIDGET!! 5/5
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love how I can customize so much! I can get my clock to match every wallpaper :-) doesn\'t slow down fone or anything either. It\'s a Must have.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Tried many clock & date apps for simple viewing. This is the best app found. Tap to launch other apps saves space. Keep adding fonts&resizing options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Absolutely LOVE this app! So happy I found this, nothing else worked or wasnt customizable like this one. Please add more fonts!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome clock widget
reviews.comment: Highly customizable clock appearance, without having too much \"other\" stuff going on. Flag themes and changeable fonts are great. I love to be able to change appearance each week! Samsung Epic, Galaxy S.  Kudos, dev!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappearing Widget
reviews.comment: No explanation why it doesn\'t reappear on widget list until there is a reboot, too.  Playing with date and time settings is awkward.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Re-trying it with 3.0 update. So far it looks to be updating again. Good job dev. MotoDroid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great clock widget! Would be 5 star if i could change color of date as well as time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simply amazing app! Lots of fonts and colors to get the clock you want. Great work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Better than 5 similar apps I previously install. My suggestion : Ability to choose from installed font, rather than inbuilt.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome. Finally a gud customizable free clock. Pls add n option 2 click n directly go 2 alarms. Also if you cud display alarm time, it wud b perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice app. Really like the tap to app choice. Can use alarm on phone as well as weather/news. Optimus T
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Was good... Then updated Epic to 2.2... Tap no longer pulls up alarm. Just clicks and nothing happens. Reinstalled, didn\'t help.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Always works & developer is constantly adding new features/customization. 5*****
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: I love this app.  I just wish there were more fancy themes like blue swirl and tribal green.  Those show true personality.  If more themes were added, I\'d give a total 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great but wish u could add color to the numbers. HTC inspire
reviews.author: A Google User
